task.title: Enable Login Using a Microsoft Live Account
task.shortdesc: Connect your Microsoft Live ID account to Livefyre to allow users to use their Microsoft Live ID logins to interact with Apps on your site.

context.p: To enable login using a Microsoft Live ID account:

step.cmd: In Livefyre > Integration Settings > Livefyre Identity > Microsoft Live, switch the Enable Microsoft Live Login toggle to On.
Enter the Microsoft Live Client ID (Private Key) and Microsoft Live Client Secret (Password).

step.info: The Microsoft Live Client ID (Private Key) and Microsoft Live Client Secret (Password) values are listed in the Microsoft Live ID app details page.
